headline: Alphabet and Robinhood: The bull vs. bear case

headline: Is It Worth Investing in Robinhood Markets (HOOD) Based on Wall Street's Bullish Views?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Robinhood Markets (HOOD) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?
